Divine contentment, or, A medicine for a discontented man and a confession of faith, and other poems upon several subjects / by Edward Manlove ... Manlove, Edward, fl. 1667.
112 p.
Printed for Richard Mills ..., London : 1667.
In verse. Numerous errors in pagination. "Poems against popery" has its own t.p. on p. [75] Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
